qas.question: When did the First Intifada break out?
How many people were killed in the violence?
PLO supported who during the Gulf War?

context: The First Intifada, a Palestinian uprising against Israeli rule, broke out in <a0_0>1987<a0_0/>, with waves of uncoordinated demonstrations and violence occurring in the occupied West Bank and Gaza. Over the following six years, the Intifada became more organised and included economic and cultural measures aimed at disrupting the Israeli occupation. <a1_0>More than a thousand people<a1_0/> were killed in the violence. During the 1991 Gulf War, the PLO supported <a2_0>Saddam Hussein<a2_0/> and Iraqi Scud missile attacks against Israel. Despite public outrage, Israel heeded US calls to refrain from hitting back and did not participate in that war.
